Remarques upon the new project of association: In a letter to a friend. Paterson, William, 1658-1719.
8 p.
Re-printed by David Lindsay., Edinburgh, : 1681.
Signed: Imprimatur William Paterson. Caption title. Remarks on a proposed association for the suppression of popish plots. "Cum privilegio"--Colophon. Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
